segments.text: I see the boy is really determined to get those cookies, he's standing on that stool like it's nothing, even though it's so unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, she looks so hopeful and excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what kind of cookies are in that jar, they must be really good and delicious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to everything going on behind her, she's just drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she is, not noticing the water overflowing all over the floor, it's like she's in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall, that stool looks so wobbly and unsafe, I would feel terrible if he got hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks like she's trying to be quiet so the woman doesn't hear them taking cookies, she's being so careful and sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both being very sneaky, but also very careful not to get caught, it's like a little game to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just so full of little surprises, like the water overflowing and the children taking cookies, it's like a happy little mystery unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen next, it's like a story that I can't wait to see unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
